question: How would you describe your body type?

options.text: A developed waist and abdomen, with a relatively weaker upper body.
The lower body is more developed than the upper body.
A developed chest, but the lower back and hips are relatively weak.
A strong head and neck area, with a weaker waist.

question: Which of the following best describes your facial features?

options.text: Distinct facial contours with a dignified and imposing look.
A somewhat long face, with a head shape that protrudes at the front and back.
A large head with a prominent, rising crown.
